title: Conecta y Canta
overview: Hosted by Sebastián Yatra, Conecta y Canta is a reality show where music becomes the connection to children and young people from all over Mexico. In this series of eight episodes, we will meet forty boys and girls who dream of becoming famous singers. For that, they have recorded a video at home with your best performance. Participants will be judged by three international celebrities from the world of the music: Kenia Os, urban singer, Mario Domm, founder of the musical group Camilla, and Poncho Lizárraga, leader of the musical group El Recodo.
